description: This file defines the Theme class, which provides centralized access to colors, fonts, and metrics for styling and UI consistency in the application.

classes.name: Theme
classes.description: A class offering static methods to retrieve colors, fonts, and layout metrics used throughout the app.

methods.name: primary
methods.description: Returns the primary color of the theme (#2563EB).

methods.name: secondary
methods.description: Returns the secondary color (#F59E0B).

methods.name: success
methods.description: Returns the success color (#F59E0B).

methods.name: error
methods.description: Returns the error color (#EF4444).

methods.name: background
methods.description: Returns the background color (#f9fafb).

methods.name: surface
methods.description: Returns the surface color (#ffffff).

methods.name: text
methods.description: Returns the text color (#111827).

methods.name: gridBackground
methods.description: Returns the grid background color.

methods.name: tileBackground
methods.description: Returns the background color for a tile, based on its value.

methods.name: tileText
methods.description: Returns the text color for a tile, based on its value.

methods.name: shadowColor
methods.description: Returns the color used for shadows.

methods.name: cornerRadius
methods.description: Returns the radius for rounded corners.

methods.name: tileCornerRadius
methods.description: Returns the corner radius for tiles.

methods.name: tileSpacing
methods.description: Returns the spacing between tiles.

methods.name: headerHeight
methods.description: Returns the height of header elements.

methods.name: animationDurationMs
methods.description: Returns the duration of animations in milliseconds.

methods.name: shadowBlurRadius
methods.description: Returns the radius for shadow blurring.

methods.name: titleFont
methods.description: Returns the font used for titles.

methods.name: scoreFont
methods.description: Returns the font used for scores.

methods.name: tileFont
methods.description: Returns the font used for tiles, based on their value.
